marklogic.body: And yes, I need a lot more. Her blood is proof of nothing unless it was enough to say a person couldn't have lost that much and lived. Otherwise it's not proof of murder if it was a small amount she could have cut herself previously, had a nose Bleed etc. The Batteries are not proof of murder. Proof that he is trying to hide something. The kid saying his mom was in the vehicle, proof that Josh Powell lied, not proof of murder. Her note points them in the direction of a suspect, again, not proof of murder.
